welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming City of Orange, where historic buildings and a vibrant culture await you! Known for its welcoming atmosphere and quaint downtown area, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as United Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as United Airlines and Air Canada.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines, JetBlue, and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves both international and domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for British Airways and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
